verses.plain: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,

tokens.t: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,

verses.plain: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)

tokens.t: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)

verses.plain: He left Judæa, and departed again into Galilee.

tokens.t: He left Judæa, and departed again into Galilee.

verses.plain: And he must needs go through Samaria.

tokens.t: And he must needs go through Samaria.

verses.plain: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.

tokens.t: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.

verses.plain: Now Jacob’s well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.

tokens.t: Now Jacob’s well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with
journey, sat thus on the well:
it was about the sixth hour.

verses.plain: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.

tokens.t: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her,
Give me to drink.

verses.plain: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)

tokens.t: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)

verses.plain: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.

tokens.t: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.

verses.plain: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

tokens.t: Jesus answered and said unto her,
If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

verses.plain: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?

tokens.t: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?

verses.plain: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?

tokens.t: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?

verses.plain: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:

tokens.t: Jesus answered and said unto her,
Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:

verses.plain: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

tokens.t: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

verses.plain: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.

tokens.t: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto her,
Go, call thy husband, and come hither.

verses.plain: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:

tokens.t: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her,
Thou hast well said, I have no husband:

verses.plain: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.

tokens.t: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.

verses.plain: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.

tokens.t: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.

verses.plain: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.

tokens.t: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto her,
Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.

verses.plain: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.

tokens.t: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.

verses.plain: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.

tokens.t: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.

verses.plain: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

tokens.t: God
a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship
in spirit and in truth.

verses.plain: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.

tokens.t: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto her,
I that speak unto thee am

verses.plain: ¶ And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?

tokens.t: ¶ And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?

verses.plain: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,

tokens.t: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,

verses.plain: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?

tokens.t: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?

verses.plain: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.

tokens.t: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.

verses.plain: ¶ In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.

tokens.t: ¶ In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.

verses.plain: But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.

tokens.t: But he said unto them,
I have meat to eat that ye know not of.

verses.plain: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him ought to eat?

tokens.t: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him
to eat?

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto them,
My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

verses.plain: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.

tokens.t: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and
cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.

verses.plain: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.

tokens.t: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.

verses.plain: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.

tokens.t: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.

verses.plain: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.

tokens.t: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.

verses.plain: ¶ And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.

tokens.t: ¶ And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.

verses.plain: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.

tokens.t: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.

verses.plain: And many more believed because of his own word;

tokens.t: And many more believed because of his own word;

verses.plain: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.

tokens.t: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard
ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.

verses.plain: ¶ Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.

tokens.t: ¶ Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.

verses.plain: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.

tokens.t: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.

verses.plain: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilæans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.

tokens.t: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilæans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.

verses.plain: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.

tokens.t: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.

verses.plain: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judæa into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.

tokens.t: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judæa into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.

verses.plain: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.

tokens.t: Then said Jesus unto him,
Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.

verses.plain: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.

tokens.t: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto him,
Go thy way; thy son liveth.
And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.

verses.plain: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.

tokens.t: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told
, saying, Thy son liveth.

verses.plain: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.

tokens.t: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.

verses.plain: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.

tokens.t: So the father knew that
at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.

verses.plain: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judæa into Galilee.

tokens.t: This
again the second miracle
Jesus did, when he was come out of Judæa into Galilee.
